name: SinImageFilter
custom_set_input:
filter->SetFunctor( Functor::Sin< typename InputImageType::PixelType, typename OutputImageType::PixelType>() );
  filter->SetInput(image1);
briefdescription: Computes the sine of each pixel.
detaileddescription:
The computations are performed using std::sin(x).
